user.title: Adaptive Thermostat: Initial Setup
user.description:
Choose a name for this thermostat instance and select its operational mode.

**Recommended Setup Order:**
1. First create a 'Central Heater' to control your main heating system
2. Then create 'Individual Zones' for each room, using the central heater as the heat source

data_description.config_type:
**Central Heater:** Controls your main heating system (boiler, heat pump, etc.). Create this first.

**Individual Zone:** Controls a specific room/area with its own valve/radiator. Can use a Central Heater as the heat source.

individual_zone_setup.title: Configure Individual Zone
individual_zone_setup.description:
Set up the entities and temperature presets for this individual heating zone.

**Tip:** If you have a Central Heater configured, you can select it as the 'Heater Entity' to create a zone that uses your central heating system.

data.heater: Heater Entity (Switch, Input Boolean, Climate, Valve, or Central Heater)

central_heater_setup.title: Configure Central Heater
central_heater_setup.description:
Set up the main heater entity for the central heating system. This will create a 'Central Heater' climate entity that can be used by Individual Zones.

**After Setup:** You can create Individual Zones that use this central heater as their heat source.

data.heater: Central Heater Entity (Climate, Switch, or Input Boolean)

reconfigure_individual_zone.title: Reconfigure Individual Zone
reconfigure_individual_zone.description:
Update the configuration for this individual heating zone.

**Tip:** You can select a Central Heater entity as the 'Heater Entity' if you want this zone to use your central heating system.

data.heater: Heater Entity (Switch, Input Boolean, Climate, Valve, or Central Heater)

reconfigure_central_heater.title: Reconfigure Central Heater
reconfigure_central_heater.description:
Update the configuration for the central heating system.

**Note:** This central heater can be used by Individual Zones as their heat source.
